mapper.insert:
insert into SYS_ORG_AGENT ( ID, SUBSYSTEM_ID, ORG_ID, THIRD_ORG_ID, AGENT_CODE, STATUS )VALUES
(#{sysOrganizationAgent.id}, #{sysOrganizationAgent.subsystemId}, #{sysOrganizationAgent.orgId}, #{sysOrganizationAgent.thirdOrgId}, #{sysOrganizationAgent.agentCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sysOrganizationAgent.status,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select: select sog.ID, sog.SUBSYSTEM_ID, sog.ORG_ID, sog.THIRD_ORG_ID, sog.AGENT_CODE, ss.SUBSYSTEM_NAME , so.ORGANIZATION_NAME, sog.STATUS from SYS_ORG_AGENT sog left join sys_org so on SOG.THIRD_ORG_ID = SO.id left join SYS_SUBSYSTEM ss on (sog.SUBSYSTEM_ID = ss.id or sog.SUBSYSTEM_ID = ss.app_id) where sog.ORG_ID = #{orgId}

select so.* from SYS_ORG_AGENT soa inner join SYS_ORG so on soa.ORG_ID=so.ID and so.DEL_FLAG != 'Y' and so.THIRD_ORG='Y' inner join SYS_SUBSYSTEM ss on (ss.ID=soa.SUBSYSTEM_ID OR SS.APP_ID = soa.SUBSYSTEM_ID) where ss.APP_ID = #{appId} or ss.id = #{appId}
